class.name: TextureLayered
class.brief_description: Base class for texture types which contain the data of multiple [Image]s. Each image is of the same size and format.
class.description: Base class for [ImageTextureLayered] and [CompressedTextureLayered]. Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types. See also [Texture3D]. Data is set on a per-layer basis. For [Texture2DArray]s, the layer specifies the array layer. All images need to have the same width, height and number of mipmap levels. A [TextureLayered] can be loaded with [method ResourceLoader.load]. Internally, Godot maps these files to their respective counterparts in the target rendering driver (Vulkan, OpenGL3).

method.name: _get_format
method.description: Called when the [TextureLayered]'s format is queried.

method.name: _get_height
method.description: Called when the [TextureLayered]'s height is queried.

method.name: _get_layer_data
method.description: Called when the data for a layer in the [TextureLayered] is queried.

method.name: _get_layered_type
method.description: Called when the layers' type in the [TextureLayered] is queried.

method.name: _get_layers
method.description: Called when the number of layers in the [TextureLayered] is queried.

method.name: _has_mipmaps
method.description: Called when the presence of mipmaps in the [TextureLayered] is queried.

method.name: get_format
method.description: Returns the current format being used by this texture.

method.name: get_height
method.description: Returns the height of the texture in pixels. Height is typically represented by the Y axis.

method.name: get_layer_data
method.description: Returns an [Image] resource with the data from specified [param layer].

method.name: get_layered_type
method.description: Returns the [TextureLayered]'s type. The type determines how the data is accessed, with cubemaps having special types.

method.name: get_width
method.description: Returns the width of the texture in pixels. Width is typically represented by the X axis.

method.name: has_mipmaps
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the layers have generated mipmaps.

constants.constant: Texture is a [Cubemap], with each side in its own layer (6 in total).
Texture is a [CubemapArray], with each cubemap being made of 6 layers.
